bibl.title: Additional Remarks on the Possible Attribution of Some Papyrus-Fragments to Post-Classical Tragedies.
bibl.note: Additions to: Studies in Fourth Century Tragedy (Athens, 1980). 1a. P. Oxy. XLVII, 3317. - 1b. P. Grenf. II, I + P. Hibeh I, 4 = P. lit. Lond. 80 (= Pack2 1708). - 2a. P. Köln I, 2 (inv. 263). - 2b. P. Oxy. XV, 1823 (= Pack2 1724). - 2c. P.S.I. II, 150 (= Pack2 1732).

bibl.title: Proceedings of the XVIII International Congress of Papyrology. I

bibl.seg: Xanthakis-Karamanos Georgia, Additional Remarks on the Possible Attribution of Some Papyrus-Fragments to Post-Classical Tragedies.
Proceedings of the XVIII International Congress of Papyrology. I (Athens, 1988) pp. 403-417.

Additions to: Studies in Fourth Century Tragedy (Athens, 1980). 1a. P. Oxy. XLVII, 3317. - 1b. P. Grenf. II, I + P. Hibeh I, 4 = P. lit. Lond. 80 (= Pack2 1708). - 2a. P. Köln I, 2 (inv. 263). - 2b. P. Oxy. XV, 1823 (= Pack2 1724). - 2c. P.S.I. II, 150 (= Pack2 1732).
